snippet.title: Growth - Official Reveal Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Enjoy the relaxing reveal trailer for Growth, an upcoming cozy, hexagonal-grid based soft-strategy game coming to PC and Nintendo Switch. In Growth, explore and populate a procedurally generated world by utilizing the unique abilities of animals. Growth blends the beauty of cozy exploration with challenging navigation around obstacles.

#GameTrailers #SoG
